title: Battery drain fast
content: Hello I have used pixel 2xl from last 1.8 years but approx from last one month it's battery was drain so fast. From 100% to 15% its take just 7 hours. Even also when I make fully charged my mobile at night and when I wake up to morning, battery was reduced to 85% (That to without using a mobile for single second in between). I guess its having battery issue and I wants to replace battery
